commit message:
- Saving vertical scrolling position when navigating from posts list to comments list or from comments list to another web view.
- Refresh list only if font size actually changed.

Merge pull request #45 from jmaltz/fix-classpath

moved around jars in the build path

Fixed classpath errors at runtime (NoClassDefFoundError).
They should now be really fixed without manual changes after cloning the repo. The .classpath from #45 did not work for me. Hope this one does for all.

Updated target sdk to 18.
The different targets in AndroidManifest.xml and project.properties were causing some problems when adding code from newer APIs, so they are now set to the same value.

Added screenSize to configChanges in the manifest.
Fixes issue #42 (Orientation changes lead to activity restarting on API 13+)

Refactored login logic out into its own activity so that it can be dropped
anywhere.  Also forced users to login before upvoting posts.
made deleted comments render properly
fixed a bug in the comments parser bug where the word reply would cause the comment not to be displayed
